core:processNote.core:description: If there is a problem with the credit note being already redeemed, expired or not existing we do not Fail but log a warning entry in the application process log and immediately return Success without saving anything else in the database. This is so that RJ Credit Note processing continues and doesnâ€™t get held up. Credit note status of expiry, existance or being already redeemed will already have been checked by the RJ POS calling the Credit Note services through the Enactor RJ Proxy and so this should be a very rare occurence.
